Buttons.Save.Tip: click to save and close, use CTRL + S to save and keep open
Buttons.Exit.Tip: exit - if something changed, you will be asked to save

SaveMode.hide.Tip: this item is not publicly visible
SaveMode.branch.Tip: changes are only visible to editors

Dialog.Title: Save Mode
Dialog.Intro: This determines how you will save. The default is show/publish.

Show.Title: Show / Publish Everything
Show.Body: Show item with changes to the public when saving.

Hide.Title: Hide Everything
Hide.Body: This item will be hidden, and only visible to content editors.

Branch.Title: Draft / Hide Changes
Branch.Body: Only editors can see changes (until published at a later time).

//: Everything below this hasn't been verified yet - much may be unused

Errors.UnclearError: Something went wrong - maybe parts worked, maybe not. Sorry :(
Errors.InnerControlMustOverride: Inner control must override this function.
Errors.UnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close this dialog?
Errors.DefLangNotFound: Default language value not found, but found multiple values - can't handle editing for
Errors.AdamUploadError: The upload failed. The most likely cause is that the file you were trying to upload is bigger than the maximum upload size.

Questions.Delete: are you sure you want to delete {{target}}?
Questions.Rename: what new name would you like for {{target}}?
Questions.SystemInput:
This is for very advanced operations. Only use this if you know what you're doing. 

 Enter admin commands:
Questions.ForceDelete: do you want to force delete '{{title}}' ({{id}})?

EditEntity.SlotUsedtrue: this item is open for editing. Click here to lock / remove it and revert to default.
EditEntity.SlotUsedfalse: this item is locked and will stay empty/default. The values are shown for your convenience. Click here to unlock if needed.

EntityQuery.QueryError: Error: An error occurred while executing the query. See the console for more information.
EntityQuery.QueryStreamNotFound: Error: The query did not return a stream named

LangMenu.NotImplemented: This action is not implemented yet.
LangMenu.CopyNotPossible: Copy not possible: the field is disabled.

Dialog.Title: Translate {{name}}
Dialog.Intro: You can do many things when translating, incl. linking languages together.

FromPrimary.Title: Translate from ({{primary}})
FromPrimary.Body: Translate and start with the value in the primary language

FromOther.Title: Translate from ...
FromOther.Body: Translate and start with the value from another language
FromOther.Subtitle: Language to translate from

LinkReadOnly.Title: Inherit to other languege (read-only)
LinkReadOnly.Body: Inherit value from another language but don't edit it.
LinkReadOnly.Subtitle: Language to inherit from

LinkShared.Title: Share with another language (read/write)
LinkShared.Body: Link languages together so they use the same value, editable.
LinkShared.Subtitle: Language to share with

LangWrapper.CreateValueInDefFirst: Please create the value for '{{fieldname}}' in the default language before translating it.

Extension.TinyMce.Image.AdamImage.Tooltip: Image from ADAM- just drop files using the Automatic Digital Assets Manager
Extension.TinyMce.Image.DnnImage.Tooltip: Image from DNN file storage (all files, slow)
Extension.TinyMce.Link.Page.Tooltip: Link a page from the current site
